title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 §§ 28-1.16 - Retroactive time credits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 §§ 28-1.16 - Retroactive time credits

State Regulations

Except for the provisions of sections
28-1.2
(i) and
28-1.3
(h) of this

Subpart, granting vacation and sick leave credits for the nine months'service
preceding the date on which an employee becomes subject to this Chapter, nothing herein contained shall be construed to provide for the granting of
retroactive vacation, sick leave or other time credits to any per diem or
hourly paid employee for service rendered prior to August 14, 1958. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
§§
28-1.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
